thread.title: AR Rahman, Sourav Ganguly to join Pele in 'Legend's Tour of India' at Kolkata

author: newsr.in
title: AR Rahman, Sourav Ganguly to join Pele in 'Legend's Tour of India' at Kolkata
text: Kolkata, Oct 8: Brazilian football great Pele will be joined by Academy and Grammy award-winning Indian musician AR Rahman during his three-day sojourn in Kolkata, organisers said here today. Tournament schedule The Mozart of Madras, who's composing music for the three-time Â»
